name: Lockwood 1220 Symphony Series Lever 70 on Round Rose - Full Set, Satin Chrome
description: Lockwood 1220 Symphony Series solid brass round rose furniture as a full set (exterior and interior roses) with Lever 70. Features concealed fixing. AS1428.1 compliant. Suitable for residential and commercial applications, requires a separate latch or mortice lock for functionality.
standardized_function_description: Lever furniture (handles and roses) as a complete set for one door (exterior and interior). Functionality (e.g., passage, privacy, entrance) is determined by the separate latch or mortice lock it is paired with.

certifications_and_standards.name: Design for access and mobility
certifications_and_standards.description_of_standard: Australian Standard for disability access in buildings.
certifications_and_standards.product_compliance_notes: Lever 70 component is compliant. Overall installation compliance is also necessary.

certifications_and_standards.name: Fire Resistant Doorsets
certifications_and_standards.description_of_standard: Australian Standard for fire door assemblies.
certifications_and_standards.product_compliance_notes: Successfully tested up to 4 hours (SL Lever - Physical Security) on suitable fire door assemblies when used with an approved Lockwood fire-rated mortice lock.

certifications_and_standards.name: Locksets and hardware for doors - Durability Rating D8
certifications_and_standards.description_of_standard: Australian Standard for durability of mechanical elements, D8 is 500,000 cycles.

certifications_and_standards.name: Locksets and hardware for doors - Corrosion Resistance C10 (SC Finish)
certifications_and_standards.description_of_standard: Australian Standard for corrosion resistance. C10 for Satin Chrome means >1000 hours Neutral Salt Spray.
certifications_and_standards.product_compliance_notes: Satin Chrome (SC) finish passes C10 - Extreme Corrosion Resistance.

lever_on_rose_details.rose_type_description: Round Concealed Fix Rose - Exterior & Interior Set

ordering_info.notes_for_ordering: Full door set. Standard finish: SC. Non-standard finishes (AZ, AU, AC, CP, ORB, PB, BU, PC, SB) may have longer lead times or additional cost. Designed for Lockwood 3770/3570 Mortice Locks or 5260/530 Latches. Door thickness 32-50mm.

additional_attributes_raw.manufacturer_specific_notes: Fixing: Concealed. Spindle: Included, 7.6mm. Finger Clearance: 37mm (AS1428.1). Rose Diameter: 53mm. Rose Projection: approx 11.6mm.

metadata.internal_notes: Updated available finishes based on specific product page info for 1220 Lever 70. This SKU is SC. Notes added for std/non-std finishes.
